verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%>, <S%G2596>in<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> that <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G5100>there<s%>, <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1320>teachers<s%>, <S%G5037><s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4826>Symeon<s%> that was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G3526>Niger<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3066>Lucius<s%> of <S%G2956>Cyrene<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3127>Manaen<s%> the <S%G4939>foster-brother<s%> of <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>.

And <S%G1161>as<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G3008>ministered<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3522>fasted<s%>, the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G873>Separate<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> I have <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G5037>them<s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%>, when they had <S%G3522>fasted<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>prayed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2007>laid<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>them<s%>, they <S%G630>sent<s%> them <S%G630>away<s%>.

So3303, 3767 <S%G3778>they<s%>, being sent <S%G1599>forth<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, went <S%G2718>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4581>Seleucia<s%>; <S%G5037>and<s%> from <S%G1564>thence<s%> they <S%G636>sailed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2954>Cyprus<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4529>Salamis<s%>, they <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> they <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> as their <S%G5257>attendant<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they had gone <S%G1330>through<s%> the whole <S%G3520>island<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> <S%G3974>Paphos<s%>, they <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3097>sorcerer<s%>, a false <S%G5578>prophet<s%>, a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was <S%G919>Bar-jesus<s%>;

who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> the <S%G446>proconsul<s%>, <S%G4588>Sergius<s%> <S%G3972>Paulus<s%>, a <S%G435>man<s%> of <S%G4908>understanding<s%>. The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> unto him <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>, and <S%G1934>sought<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1681>Elymas<s%> the <S%G3097>sorcerer<s%> <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3177>is<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> by <S%G3177>interpretation<s%>) <S%G436>withstood<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to turn <S%G1294>aside<s%> the <S%G446>proconsul<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G4569>Saul<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> is <S%G2532>also<s%> called <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, filled <S%G4130>with<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, fastened his <S%G816>eyes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G2532>him<s%>,

and <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1388>guile<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4468>villany<s%>, thou <S%G5207>son<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%>, thou <S%G2190>enemy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>, wilt <S%G3973>thou<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3973>cease<s%> to <S%G1294>pervert<s%> the <S%G2117>right<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G991>seeing<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> <S%G891>for<s%> a <S%G2540>season<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> there <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G887>mist<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4655>darkness<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he went <S%G4013>about<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> some to lead him by the <S%G5497>hand<s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> the <S%G446>proconsul<s%>, when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> what was <S%G1096>done<s%>, <S%G4100>believed<s%>, being <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> and his <S%G4012>company<s%> set <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3974>Paphos<s%>, and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4011>Perga<s%> in <S%G3828>Pamphylia<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G672>departed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> and <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G846>they<s%>, passing <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4011>Perga<s%>, <S%G3854>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch<s%> of <S%G4099>Pisidia<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, and sat <S%G2523>down<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G320>reading<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> the rulers of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G435><s%> <S%G80>Brethren<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> ye <S%G2076>have<s%> any <S%G3056>word<s%> of exhortation1722, 5213 <S%G4314>for<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>, say <S%G3004>on<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> stood <S%G450>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> beckoning <S%G2678>with<s%> the <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G435>Men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> ye that <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G191>hearken<s%>:

The <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1586>chose<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5312>exalted<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> they <S%G3940>sojourned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> a <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G1023>arm<s%> led <S%G1806>he<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> forth <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G846>it<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G5550>time<s%> of forty <S%G5063>years<s%> as a <S%G5159>nursing-father<s%> bare <S%G846>he<s%> them <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G2507>destroyed<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G5477>Canaan<s%>, he <S%G2624>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1093>land<s%> for an <S%G2624>inheritance<s%>, for about four <S%G5071>hundred<s%> and <S%G4004>fifty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>:
and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> he <S%G1325>gave<s%> them <S%G2923>judges<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4545>Samuel<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>.

And <S%G2547>afterward<s%> they <S%G154>asked<s%> for a <S%G935>king<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4549>Saul<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2797>Kish<s%>, a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5443>tribe<s%> of <S%G958>Benjamin<s%>, for the space of <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G3179>removed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, he raised up1453, 846 <S%G1138>David<s%> to <S%G1519>be<s%> their <S%G935>king<s%>; to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he bare <S%G3140>witness<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, I have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G1138>David<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> son of <S%G2421>Jesse<s%>, a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> shall <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%>.

Of <S%G575><s%> this <S%G5127>man<s%>'s <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G1453>hath<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1453>brought<s%> unto <S%G2474>Israel<s%> a <S%G4990>Saviour<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>;

when <S%G4296><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> had first <S%G4296>preached<s%> before4253, 4383 <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1529>coming<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilling<s%> his <S%G1408>course<s%>, he <S%G3004>said<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> suppose ye <S%G5282>that<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1511>am<s%>? <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G235>he<s%>. But <S%G2400>behold<s%>, there cometh <S%G2064>one<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> the <S%G5266>shoes<s%> <S%G4228>of<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>unloose<s%>.

<S%G435><s%> <S%G80>Brethren<s%>, <S%G435>children<s%> of the <S%G1085>stock<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> that <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, to <S%G5213>us<s%> <S%G649>is<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> sent <S%G649>forth<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> they that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%>, because they <S%G50>knew<s%> <S%G5126>him<s%> <S%G50>not<s%>, nor <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G314>read<s%> every3956, 2596 <S%G4521>sabbath<s%>, <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> them by condemning <S%G2919>him<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> though they <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G156>cause<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> in <S%G154>him<s%>, yet asked they of <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> should be <S%G337>slain<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> they had <S%G5055>fulfilled<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> things that were <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, they <S%G2507>took<s%> him <S%G2507>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3586>tree<s%>, and <S%G5087>laid<s%> him <S%G1519>in<s%> a <S%G3419>tomb<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>:

and <S%G3739><s%> he was <S%G3700>seen<s%> for <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> of them that came up <S%G4872>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G3748>who<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> now <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G1909>people<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2097>bring<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> good <S%G2097>tidings<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> the <S%G3962>fathers<s%>,

that <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G1603>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> unto our2254, 846 <S%G5043>children<s%>, in that he raised <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>; <S%G450><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> it <S%G1125>is<s%> <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G5568>psalm<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, this <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G1080>have<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1080>begotten<s%> <S%G3754>thee<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as concerning <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G450>raised<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G450>up<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, now no <S%G3371>more<s%> <S%G3195>to<s%> <S%G5290>return<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1312>corruption<s%>, he hath <S%G2046>spoken<s%> on this <S%G3754>wise<s%>, I will <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> the holy and <S%G4103>sure<s%> <S%G3741>blessings<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%>.

Because <S%G1352><s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G1325>psalm<s%>, Thou wilt <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G4675>Thy<s%> Holy <S%G3741>One<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1312>corruption<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1138>David<s%>, after he had in his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G5256>served<s%> the <S%G1012>counsel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, fell <S%G2837>asleep<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G4369>laid<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3303>corruption<s%>:
but <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> raised <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1312>corruption<s%>.

Be <S%G2077>it<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G435><s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> this <S%G435>man<s%> is <S%G2605>proclaimed<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5129>him<s%> every one that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%>, from <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%>.
